topic.title: Comments and Tracked Changes - Input HTML Fragment

body.p: This section contains information about how each type of tracked change is structured in an HTML document.

section.title: Insertions
section.p: For an insertion type of tracked change, the structure that defines the insertion details is inside a range (oxy-range-start to oxy-range-end), the inserted text is highlighted by a span element with the class oxy-insert-hl, and the details are stored in a xpan element with the oxy-insert class.
section.codeblock: dan insert 2018/03/15 09:38:29 +02:00 This is an insert!!

section.title: Comments
section.p: Similar to insertions, comments are defined in a range (oxy-range-start to oxy-range-end), the comment details in an element with the class oxy-comment, and the highlighted content is wrapped in the oxy-comment-hl element.

p.codeblock: dan This is a comment. 2018/03/15 09:56:59 +02:00 The commented text.

section.title: Attribute changes
section.p: The attribute changes are more complex. The range is empty, and is directly above the affected element (the one that has modified attributes). The element with the class oxy-attributes contains details about multiple attribute changes, each stored in an element with the class oxy-attribute-change.

section.title: Deletions
section.p: For a deletion, there are some elements that define the start and end of the deletion, and the highlighted text is wrapped in an element with the class oxy-delete-hl.
